channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report E-2024030128
item.description:
Report E-2024030128

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2024021917
item.description:
Report X-2024021917

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-20
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AN AIR PACKAGE APPEARED HEAVIER THAN THE 40 LB STATED WEIGHT ON THE THERMAL LABEL. ADDITIONALLY, THERE ARE TWO HANDHELD HOLES ON TWO SIDES OF THE U-HAUL HEAVY-DUTY BOX THAT ARE NOT SEALED. DURING SORTING PROCESS RIFLE AMMUNITION BEGAN FALLING OUT OF THE HANDHELD HOLES. RESPONDER INSPECTED CONTENTS TO FIND THE BOX WEIGHS 101 LBS AND CONTAINS SMALL ARMS AMMUNITION. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DANGEROUS GOODS ARE CONTAINED INSIDE THE BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024021830
item.description:
Report X-2024021830

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-25
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found wet and upon inspection bottle was found with a loose cap causing leaking due to a loose seal as well. DescribePack: Package failed due to loose cap and broken seal under cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: in house clean up
